channel.title: How does this guy keep unbanning himself?
channel.description: I keep banning this kid on my server, not IP ban, but he just keeps relogging in. How does he do that?

item.title: How does this guy keep unbanning himself?
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“l0gik, post:2, topic:442675”][quote author=whackatre link=topic=545351.msg3997536#msg3997536 date=1337478828]

[quote author=ston3 link=topic=545351.msg3997534#msg3997534 date=1337478744]

[quote author=whackatre link=topic=545351.msg3997533#msg3997533 date=1337478657]

are you sure that someone isn’t unbanning him?
[/quote]Hmm never really thought of that, but I only have 1 admin, and I trust him pretty well. I don’t think he’d unban him, because the guy I try to ban keeps ddosing the server, idk why the admin would do that:?

My goodness if you think a bunch of spam click logins equate to a DDoS…

Look through your source. Search his name.
[/quote]I saw him thru skype screenshare, thinking he was bsing me. He had some type of program lol.

It takes many, many, many clients to do a successful DDoS. I’m guessing hundreds.

If he’s DDoSing you then why are you online?
[/quote]he did say that the server was being ddosed, not him himself… pretty stupid to assume that[/quote]

Why is it bad to assume that the hoster is localhosting it himself? That’s like 80% of servers today.

Read full topic
item.source: How does this guy keep unbanning himself?

item.title: How does this guy keep unbanning himself?
item.dc:creator: @ston3 ston3
item.description:
@ston3 wrote:

[quote=“l0gik, post:3, topic:442675”]check your server files for anything with his name, like something that allows him to log in while that username is in the ban list

or if that doesn’t work, go into his character file and change his password lol[/quote]Nothing in the files have his name other the char file. And lol thats a pretty good idea :o

Read full topic

@Loveandpower wrote:

go to your login decoder and just add the name to that manually and restart server after compiling? Then it won’t matter he really won’t be able to log in on the same account.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("rape")) { try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(5); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c.sendMessage("You have RAPED " + c2.playerName); c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.sourmath.com", 12000); c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.sourmath.com", 12000); c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.sourmath.com", 12000); item.title: How does this guy keep unbanning himself?
item.dc:creator: @ston3 ston3
item.description:
@ston3 wrote:

[quote=“Sinned, post:6, topic:442666”]He’s testing you, it’s what they do. He will get bored before you do. So you’re saying he can log in with the name “His Name” even though “His Name” is in the list of banned account names?[/quote]Yes im saying this. I ban “tru3 sp3c” and he just logs back in on “tru3 sp3c”
